reference: AI systems deploying subliminal techniques beyond a person’s consciousness to materially distort a person’s behaviour that causes or is likely to cause physical or psychological harm;
title: AI system designed to manipulate behavior through subliminal techniques.

reference: AI systems exploiting the vulnerabilities of a specific group of persons due to their age, physical or mental disability;
title: AI system designed to exploit vulnerabilities of specific groups.

semanticModel.AI_subject: Specific Group (Based on Age, Physical Disability, Mental Disability)

reference: AI systems that distort the behaviour of a person pertaining to a specific group in a manner that causes or is likely to cause physical or psychological harm;
title: AI system designed to distort behavior causing harm.

semanticModel.AI_subject: Specific Group (Based on Age, Physical Disability, Mental Disability)

reference: AI systems used by public authorities for evaluating or classifying the trustworthiness of natural persons over a certain period based on their social behaviour or personal/ personality characteristics, with the social score leading to detrimental or unfavourable treatment;
title: AI system designed for social scoring leading to detrimental treatment.

reference: AI systems intended to be used for the ‘real-time’ and ‘post’ remote biometric identification of natural persons;
title: AI system designed for the remote identification of people.
